ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 219
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Earlier Ive been told these are remains from beta, when tinkerers was supposed to be able to tinker pets. I guess Verrant has forgot to take them out
ygData.messageBody:
> Message: 3
> Date: Mon, 31 Jan 2000 15:12:50 -0800 (PST)
> From: Isabella Tickler <macootie@...>
> Subject: Re: Digest Number 218
>
> Does anybody know what those "functional frost
> modules" are for? They sold/dropped by gnome miners
> in Sol A? Other players keep offering them to me
> thinking they are used for tinkering.
>
> Strega
> 38 lvl Magician on The Rathe


Earlier Ive been told these are remains from beta,
when tinkerers was supposed to be able to tinker pets.
I guess Verrant has forgot to take them out
(surprise), or maybe they are thinking about
implementing tinkered pets after all?
I wouldnt mind that :)

Captain Piip Ignatz
